string-array.name: sectionListSchedules
string-array.item: All day every day for the rest of your life

string-array.name: sectionListDescriptions
string-array.item: This course will teach students the fundamentals of theoretical and applied necromancy, structural and proportional corpse reconstruction, madness and knowledge, necromancy vocabulary, and basic resurrection.
